name: SEBI LODR Regulation 31 - Shareholding Pattern
description: Listed entity shall submit shareholding pattern within specified timelines
requirements: Disclosure of promoter shareholding, public shareholding, institutional holdings

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 33 - Financial Results
description: Quarterly and annual financial results disclosure requirements
requirements: Audited/limited review financial results, segment reporting, exceptional items

name: SEBI BRSR - Business Responsibility and Sustainability Reporting
description: ESG disclosures covering environmental, social and governance parameters
requirements: Disclosures on environmental impact, social welfare, governance practices, stakeholder engagement

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 23 - Related Party Transactions
description: Prior approval and disclosure requirements for related party transactions
requirements: Material RPTs require shareholder approval, disclosure in financial statements and annual report
